H0.text: Cable News Network (CNN), the first channel to provide 24-hour television news coverage, was founded by Ted Turner in what year. 1975

H1.text: Cable News Network (CNN), the first channel to provide 24-hour television news coverage, was founded by Ted Turner in what year. 1978

H2.text: Cable News Network (CNN), the first channel to provide 24-hour television news coverage, was founded by Ted Turner in what year. 1979

H3.text: Cable News Network (CNN), the first channel to provide 24-hour television news coverage, was founded by Ted Turner in what year. 1980

A5.text: The channel's first newscast aired on June 1, 1980.
